title: Where Is Water?
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 38 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: In this simple, easy-to-decode leveled reader, students learn about all of the places where they can find water. Rivers, lakes, streams, oceans, and even underground caves are introduced through patterned text and beautiful photographs.
meta: ground, lakes, ocean, rivers, sky, water
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text

Initial Sound : Differentiate initial sounds in oral words
Consonants : Sound out words beginning with Ww
Capitalization and Punctuation : Use capital letters and periods in sentences
Content Vocabulary : Understand meanings of content vocabulary
